allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Include ''*.html'' -Exclude ''backup*'' | Where-Object { $_FullName -notmatch ''\\backup\\'' } | ForEach-Object { $content = Get-Content $_FullName -Raw -Encoding UTF8; if \($content -match ''pl28253369\\.effectivegatecpm\\.com''\) { $content = $content -replace ''pl28253369\\.effectivegatecpm\\.com'', ''aloudalimonyexplosion.com''; Set-Content $_FullName $content -Encoding UTF8 -NoNewline; Write-Output \(''Updated popup domain: '' + $_Name\) } }")
